column1: EVTDESC992273;The immigration system in Vae Victis is a bit different from IGOR: At the start of the game the 3 African nations start as Immigrant Nations and will evenly get immigrants with split immigration. However
column2: once American Colonies start to get going the African Nations will lose their New World status and immigration will focus entirely on the New World. Immigration is split into 3 month blocks so that every New World colony will get some Immigrants. Note that likely late game
column3: if all New World nations are annexed
column4: the African Tags will start to get immigrants again.;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: EVTDESC992274;The Romqart Federation is a timed formable that can be formed by either Rewm
column3: and Illyria. Any nation that forms this keeps their primary culture
column4: but the Province of Rewm is automatically assimilated and you gain a massive 400% assimilation bonus for the Rewmqart and Italic cultures. This works much like how the Italy Formation is set up in IGOR: There's several provinces which are considered Victory Points: Mediolanum
column11: and Iader. If you own a certain amount of Victory Points
column12: you will get the decision to form the Rewmqart Federation and automatically annex Rewm and Italia. You will need 8 Victory points in 670 at first but every 5 years the amount of VPs needed lowers by 1 down to 5. Rewm has a easier path and can form with 7-4 VPs. However
column13: if you do not form this nation before the year 700

column1: EVTDESC992279;Because of the way the game's supply system works not having 100% supply is devastating to reinforcement. It is for this reason it is incredibly important to make sure you can 100% supply your army otherwise you will lack reinforcement. If you reinforce 50% you will only get 50% reinforcement for the first unit and then a diminishing 50% for each sequesential unit. The first brigade may reinforce 900 the next 450 after that 225 and so on. This is why not having 100% supply is devastating.;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: EVTDESC992283;The immigration system in IGoR currently rotates each month. This means that one month North America will receive all the immigrants while South America gets none and then the next month
column2: South America will receive all the immigrants while North America gets none. The only exception to this rule is the USA
column3: who recieves immigration during both periods.;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: EVTDESC992284;Colonization works in 4 major phases: LR 30 is colonized in 670 (Prophylaxis Against Malaria)
column2: LR 25 is colonized in 680 (Mission to Civilize)
column4: and finally LR 15 is unlocked in 705 (Indigenous Garrisoning). LR 10 can never be colonized (realistically these areas are too cold for colonization during the time frame of the game). Most of the New World is between 30-20 LR.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
